content: karpe diem useless goldfish monster hat ver 1 2 © akabekobotan 2016 this work is licensed under a creative commons attribution-noncommercial-sharealike 4 0 international license see http //creativecommons org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4 0/ hello there have i got a deal just for you i ll let you have a swell magikarp for just 500 what do you say materials  100g carnival 8ply acrylic in orange  20g carnival 8ply acrylic in yellow  20g carnival 8ply acrylic in white  10g carnival 8ply acrylic in pink  small amount carnival 8ply acrylic in black  4 0mm crochet hook  knitting bee/knitting nancy  wool needle pattern notes  uk crochet symbols are used throughout this pattern see http //www simplycrochetmag co uk/2013/07/04/uk-and-us-crochet-conversion- chart/ for conversions  gauge 9 row x 16 treble_crochet over 10cm/4  this pattern fits fairly snugly around the head but can be adjusted slightly without affecting the final look increase or decrease foundation row in multiples of 6  stitches used slip_stitch double_crochet decrease half_double_crochet treble_crochet tr2tog fptr magic_ring  where indicated use the invisible fasten_off to ensure the edge is neat http //www stitch-story com/2010/12/invisible-fasten-off-one-of-my-favorite html  caution this pattern has not been beta tested stitches have been counted to the best of my ability but there is a reason i m not a mathematician or a census taker your results may vary proceed with care © akabekobotan 2016 a body start with pink yarn foundation row chain 84 slip_stitch into first chain row 1-4 chain 3 treble_crochet to end of round slip_stitch into 3rd chain of starting chain change to orange yarn fold work in half lengthwise wrong side facing match up row 4 with foundation chain row 5 chain 3 treble_crochet to end of round picking up loops from row 4 and foundation chain see below slip_stitch into 3rd chain of starting chain row 6-14 chain 3 treble_crochet to end of round slip_stitch into 3rd chain of starting chain row 15 chain 3 fptr to end of round slip_stitch into 3rd chain of starting chain row 16 chain 3 treble_crochet to end of round slip_stitch into 3rd chain of starting chain row 17 chain 1 double_crochet to end of round picking up loops from row 14 and 16 see below slip_stitch into starting chain © akabekobotan 2016 row 18 chain 1 * skip 2 st 5 treble_crochet in next st skip 2 st 1 double_crochet in next st ** repeat * to ** to end of row slip_stitch into 1st chain of row row 19 chain 3 2 treble_crochet in same st as chain-3 just made * skip 2 st 1 double_crochet in next st which is the center st of the 5-treble_crochet shell skip 2 st 5 treble_crochet in next st ** repeat * to ** to end of row ending the last repeat with 2 treble_crochet in in slip_stitch of previous row slip_stitch into 3rd chain of starting chain row 20-25 repeat row 18 and row 19 4 times row 26 chain
